findings.title: Business Logic Error In claimRewardsForBroker()
findings.description: Improper recording of `brokersClaimedRewards` state about the broker in the `claimRewardsForBroker()` function

findings.title: Potential LP2 Front-running For Reduced Loss
findings.description: In the `Shield` protocol, there is an innovative feature, i.e., the `dual liquidity pool model`. When a new order is created, the private pool (`LP2`) is first checked for a possible match before evaluating with the public pool (`LP1`). Naturally, when there is a need to liquidate a private pool-matched order, the respective provider in `LP2` will be deducted for possible deficit, if any.
